author: Omkar Godbole
title: Leveraged Bitcoin Longs on Bitfinex Weakest Since December and it Could Mean Rally Time
description: Leveraged bitcoin longs on Bitfinex have dropped to their lowest since December, suggesting a bullish trend for Bitcoin.
content: Those who have followed financial markets for some time may have heard of contrary indicators. These metrics are often misleading at first glance some appear positive but tend to signal a market down… [+1585 chars]
